column5: Remember someone recently asked about this sale, well its on through march 16 (TODAY!) - 21! The sale apply in-store and at the booth at Sportsmen' Show.  I'm guessing the selection will probably be better at the store? But perhaps the newer stuff are at the show?  One thing I learnt from past event is that sometimes they might bump the price for certain items up just a bit for the sale, so you might not save as much as you think.  Regardless of their little tricks, I usually find myself enjoying this event  LeBaron No Tax Sale Flyer No tax on regular items, I don't think you  can combine with the club 10% membership on top. Sale items are excluded so are other things mentioned in the fine print.  No, I don't work for them, just a customer who has spent ridiculous amount of money there, and for many years to come.
99% sure you can't use the 10% club discount, unless they changed it.
I couldn't use my card when I went today.
That's sad to hear. Last time they had the no-tax sale I also got the membership discount and loaded up as a result.
Same here! Last time I went right back in and bought another $150 worth of gear.  I asked the girl if she was sure, and she said yes.
Wierd.  That doesn't add up.  If you pay for membership you should get to use it.

With the dollar approaching parity and on track to hit $1.07US by July, you would think they would be a little more price aggressive.... I just looked at a Yamaha ATV and it was $3,000 more in Canada than US...   :-(
...I also saw a pig today that looked like it was about to take flight...but then it farted and sat back down
